title: Hi, I'm
a Full-Stack Developer.
quickDescription: With 2+ years experienced in creating scalable web applications with modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.
name: Kismath ADELEKE

items.description: Completed through a two-year apprenticeship at Bien’ici as a full-stack developer. Degree focused on  software engineering and compilation theory.
Developed strong foundations in software development and systems design.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
items.description: Development of the "Mega Widget 3D" application, an interactive visualization solution for real estate projects.
moreDetails: Developed a 3D visualization tool for real estate projects, allowing users to explore properties in a virtual environment.
Implemented a dynamic, user-friendly interface, enabling users to customize their property search.
Collaborated with the design team to create a visually appealing, intuitive user experience.
Optimized application performance, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.

items.title: Developper DevSecOps
items.description: Automate application management with WAPT packages (deployment, updates, and removal).
moreDetails: Developed a Python script to automate the deployment of software packages, reducing manual workload by 50%.
Implemented a continuous integration pipeline, resulting in a 40% reduction in deployment time.
Collaborated with the development team to improve application security and performance.
Provided technical support to clients, resolving issues and ensuring optimal application performance.

contactMe.title: Contact me
contactMe.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to send me a message.

title: A little about
Me
allaboutMe.intro: I’m a Software Engineer located in France. I  am passionate about  UI effects and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.
details: I thrive on challenges, tackling them with creativity and precision to deliver optimal solutions.
I’m eager to work across the creative frontend spectrum, collaborating on ambitious projects with like-minded, positive people.
Beyond coding, I’m deeply passionate about fitness and boxing, exploring the outdoors with friends, binge-watching top TV series, and immersing myself in English literature.

pageNotFound.title: Look like you're lost
pageNotFound.description: The page you are looking for is not available. Please check the URL or go back to the homepage.

quickLearning.title: Quick Learning
quickLearning.description: Best software developers are often fantastic self-learners.The ideal skill any person can have is understanding how to learn, and ideal developers have acquired the skill of self-learning.

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Problem-solving is a one of the most important part of the work. Problem-solving also has to do with utilizing creativity and logical thought processes to identify problems and resolve them with software.

admitMistakes.title: Admit Mistakes
admitMistakes.description: We, as software developers, need to learn to admit our mistakes. Of course, making mistakes happens to all of us.The most important thing to do is to make an effort to learn from them and try to avoid them in the future.
